functions.tag: {display:{Lore:['[{"text":"Research Notes:","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"A never-before seen seed.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"Its species is an ongoing subject of study.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']}}

{display:{Lore:['[{"text":"Research Notes:","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"The damaged carapace of an arthropod.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"Whatever shed it must have been gigantic...","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']}}

{display:{Lore:['[{"text":"Research Notes:","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"Your bog-standard tardigrade, but scaled up to gargantuan size.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"It\'s unclear exactly how this tardigrade became so large,","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"but given the circumstances, you can probably guess.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']}}

{display:{Lore:['[{"text":"Research Notes:","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"A chunk of amber, found buried in moss.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"No mosquito to be found, unfortunately.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']}}

{display:{Lore:['[{"text":"Research Notes:","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"A living sample of the moss that covers the rocky ground of the Exclusion Zone.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"It is incredibly aggressive, taking over small pebbles in mere minutes.","italic":false,"color":"gray"}]']}}
